name: Project 2: Pinball
description:
Basic premise of the game

A Nostalgic Game of Classic Pinball Set in the Midsts of an Extraterrestrial 

World. Keep the Ball in Play and Earn the Highest Score.

How to play the game

Shoot the Ball Using Space and Earn Points by Hitting the Targets. Navigate/Shoot 

the Ball with the Triggers using (A,D).
